description: Inject Moroccan flavours into your pumpkin soup with this easy soup recipe. When itâ€™s ready to serve, swirl through yoghurt and top with pistachios.
name: Moroccan Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp smoked paprika (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, celery and garlic and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until vegetables have softened. Add spices and cook, stirring, for 1 minutes or until fragrant.
Add pumpkin, then stir in stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until pumpkin is very soft.
Remove pan from heat and allow to cool. Using a stick blender, blend until smooth, then return to low heat and bring to a simmer. Stir through cream and season.
Turn off heat and stir through lemon juice. Ladle soup into bowls, swirl through yoghurt, then top with pistachio, parsley and extra paprika. Serve with bread.
